replies.content: More iconic even, was the visit to the Transport Museum Shop. Yes, to the shop and not to the museum itself. Sadly, we didnâ€™t have time to visit the museum yesterday. I would say that this shop is quite dangerous for me since I like everything transit. I ended up buying what I think is the most iconic souvenir I could get: a pillow with the same fabric as the seats of the trains from the Elizabeth Line! I love it https://cdn.fosstodon.org/media_attachments/files/114/001/279/257/545/157/original/da7498e3c32b51a1.jpeg https://cdn.fosstodon.org/media_attachments/files/114/001/279/490/641/660/original/b7feb41d71c21ad2.jpeg
replies.author: Henrique Dias
